--- Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:


> As the door irised shut behind the five, Cyclonus turned back to
> Unicron. 
> 
> Vorpal for his part had held his silence until now, but with a small
> crafty smile appearing on his face he spoke, "Lord Unicron, what are
> your plans for the Earth?"

Scourge figited as all of them waited for an answer to Vorpal's
question to unicron, he glanced at Nightstrike and Darkfate, for a long
moment, his optics unreadable, then he returned his gaze to the floor.

Cyclonus glanced up at Vopral and then at Unicron, "Lord Unicron?"
Cyclonus' voice is low and respectful, yet carrying a note of
curiosity, "Do you have any further orders for us, your most loyal
servants?"

Preston
(Da'minion)
